md:
giải nghĩa từ "semoyah" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Semoyah: /seˈmoʔjah/ (n) - người Semoyah, dân tộc Semoyah
	+ Meaning: Semoyah people, a tribe in Malaysia.
	+ Example sentence: "The Semoyah people live in the remote areas of Sarawak."
	+ Related words: Orang Asli, indigenous, tribe, Sarawak.

* Semoyah: /seˈmoʔjah/ (adj) - thuộc về người Semoyah, của người Semoyah
	+ Meaning: related to the Semoyah people, of the Semoyah tribe.
	+ Example sentence: "The Semoyah language is spoken by the Semoyah people in Sarawak."
	+ Related words: Orang Asli, indigenous, tribe, Sarawak.

Note: The Semoyah people are an indigenous tribe living in the remote areas of Sarawak, Malaysia. They have their own language and culture, which are distinct from the Malay and Chinese communities in the region.

Note: The Semoyah people are an indigenous tribe living in the remote areas of Sarawak, Malaysia. They have their own language and culture, which are distinct from the Malay and Chinese communities in the region.
